mapper.select: SELECT o.OFFER_ID ,o.OFFER_NAME,o.OFFER_DESC,o.PRICING,oa.DEFAULT_VALUE FROM offer o LEFT JOIN (SELECT oat.* FROM offer_attr oat LEFT JOIN dictionary d ON oat.ATTR_ID = d.DICTIONARY_ID WHERE d.ATTR_NAME="缩略图地址") oa ON o.offer_id=oa.offer_id ;

select p.PROD_ID,p.PROD_NAME,p.PROD_DESC,ppa.DEFAULT_VALUE from offer_prod_rel opr left join product p on opr.PROD_ID = p.PROD_ID LEFT JOIN (select pa.PROD_ID,pa.DEFAULT_VALUE from prod_attr pa left join dictionary d on pa.ATTR_ID=d.dictionary_id where d.attr_name="图片地址") ppa ON p.PROD_ID = ppa.PROD_ID where opr.OFFER_ID = #{OFFER_ID} ;

select p.PROD_ID,p.PROD_NAME,p.PROD_DESC,ppa.DEFAULT_VALUE from prod_rel pr left join product p on pr.prod_id=p.PROD_ID left join (select pa.PROD_ID,pa.DEFAULT_VALUE from prod_attr pa left join dictionary d on pa.ATTR_ID=d.dictionary_id where d.attr_name="图片地址") ppa ON pr.PROD_ID = ppa.PROD_ID where pr.PAR_PROD_ID = #{PROD_ID} ;
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cart SET USER_ID = (SELECT ID USER_ID FROM user_info WHERE USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME}) , USER_NAME = #{USER_NAME} , OFFER_ID = #{OFFER_ID} , OFFER_NAME = (SELECT OFFER_NAME FROM offer WHERE OFFER_ID = #{OFFER_ID})
